metadata.title: CVE-2017-0841 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android system (libutils). Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-37723026.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-0841` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

adb - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libadb - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libbacktrace - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libbase - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libcrypto-utils - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libcutils - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-liblog - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libnativebridge - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libnativeloader - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libsparse - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libutils - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-libziparchive - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-platform-system-core-headers - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-sdk-libsparse-utils - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
android-tools-mkbootimg - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
append2simg - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
fastboot - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
img2simg - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
mkbootimg - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
simg2img - 1:8.1.0+r3-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:8.1.0+r3-5').
